reviewText: The product arrived on time and in great condition.I bought this for my dad for Father's Day and he loved it. We all watched it together and it really was a good collection of Elvis's perfomances. Amerian Trilogy is still our all time favorite. Still brings a tear to the eye. :)
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: this is the ultimate Elvis collection starting from hisbeginning ending with his comeback. the rare footage andlive performances shows why he's called the KING! he didit first and the best and kick it all off!
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: The DVD presents a good synopsis of his performances. Love watching Elvis do anything. And the sinigng, of course, is superb.
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: Old video footage with what was available at the time, but I certainly enjoyed it. Got to see an Elvis I had really seen before. Backstage stuff and all.

reviewText: Always a treat to see him live.  Over and over again.  If you don't have this DVD your missing out.

reviewText: I wish the dvd had been mostly his songs, but it came across as a history of Elvis.  Too much background and not enough singing.

reviewText: If your a I want everything Elvis, this is for you..If you have This is Elvis, and Elvis on tour, then you have this.
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: I love Elvis, and I love the footage.  But I have absolutely no idea why performances of Elvis onstage and from movies are sometimes overdubbed with Elvis singing the same songs in studio.  It ruins the charm of "great performances."  Sorry to two greats who put this together, George Klein and Jerry Schilling.
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: THIS IS AMUST BUY THIS IS A GREAT DVD, I REALLY LIKE THIS  THERE IS SO MUCH ENJOYMENT IN THIS DVD BOY I'M GLAD I OWN.you won't be sorry
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: ...The King! No matter how old you are, no matter when he passed away, Elvis is still the King of all time.
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: I love this Elvis collection.  This DVD set includes some of Elvis's most classic performances from 1956 all the way up to a few weeks before he passed away.  It really brings me back to the time when he was the hottest thing on the music scene.  A nice bonus in this collection are the interviews with his close friends and musicians and the personal home movies of Elvis. Definitely worth the $15!
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: I really recommend you buy this DVD!  If you're an Elvis fan (I am!) or simply admire good music, then you will love "Elvis- The Great Performances". Not only it includes more than 30 performances of his greatest hits and other bonus features, but also the quality of it is superb. The videos were great and it really made me feel like I was a part of those performances. I was surprised to see that there's even an option to listen to it in 5.1 Audio, which I recommend you do, because it enhances the quality of his music even more. I'm very happy and satisfied with my new purchase.
summary: Great Elvis performances, home movies, music...
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: I Love Elvis, Thank You!
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: Elvis!  The King!  He is the most important man in rock and roll and this comprehensive set shows why.  I was really impressed with the restoration of the material and fascinated by the interviews with Carl Perkins and Jerry Lee Lewis.  This definitely captures Elvis at his liveliest!  Every Elvis fan should own this to enjoy his brilliant performances!
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: Welp here is a word of warning. If you dont have a widescreen tv do not buy this release. Buy the previous dvd release of this from the 90s.What they have done is places a 4x3 picture inside a 16x9 widescreen. The result is when you watch it on a full screen tv, the pciture has black bars on the top and bottom as well as the left and right sides..A TOTAL Ripoff. When are companies going to wake up and see that more people still have full screen tvs than widescreen tvs.Why not give us a true 4x3 picture as it was shown back in the day..???
summary: Avoid this release if you only have a Full Screen CRT TV
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: We found this a great addition to our collection.  Elvis was of our era in music entertainment.  The songs were beautiful and brought back many memories.
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: Of course 2 hours of Elvis (why it is on 2 DVDs is just to give the impression of more and charge more)....is always 5 stars!  My rating is because until I stuck it into my player I had no idea I was repurchasing DVDs I've owned for years with different artwork etc.  If you have the 3 Elvis DVDs or the 3 DVD set...Elvis - The Great Performances Box Setyou have all this so SKIP!My one star rating is to try and make others take a second look.....and make sure before buying. I can't imagine any fan already not owning these.Its obvious by the low helpful rating that people aren't reading my review but are ELVIS fans who think I'm bashing the King. As I said in my review...its just to let others like me who jump on anything new ELVIS ...check before wasting money. The one star isn't going to hurt Elvis....its to help.. excuse me.
summary: trying to SAVE another fan this RE-Purchase!!
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: This is a wonderful concert!!! We are Elvis fans.  We enjoy watching this again and again.  The music is great.
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: There are a number of great Elvis collections out there, but this one is my favorite for the following reasons:1. Spans just about his whole career from when he was taking off in 1956 to right before he died2. Includes home videos of Elvis with friends and family - really gives you another side to the man3. Really interesting interviews with legends and friends of Elvis like Jerry Lee Lewis & Sam Phillips4. You really can't get more Elvis performances and songs for this price.
summary: A Great Collection of Elvis Performances
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances

reviewText: This was a good choice. It has a lot of early performances and some later ones too. If you are a Elvis or not a good view.
Title: Elvis Presley: The Great Performances
